properties.entry: SELECT ORDER_CODE , OD.M_CODE , ORDER_AMOUNT , ORDER_COMPANY , ORDER_INVOICE , ORDER_STATUS , ORDER_DATE , CU_NAME , P_NAME , PM_TOTALCOST FROM "ORDER" OD JOIN SUBORDER SB USING (ORDER_CODE) LEFT JOIN CUSTOM PD USING (CU_CODE) LEFT JOIN PRODUCT PD USING (P_CODE) JOIN PAYMENT PA USING (PM_CODE) WHERE OD.M_CODE = ?
